page.title: 05JONATHAN FRICKER'S LEISURE
page.content: I live in between Hanslope and Castlethorpe and I like to go shooting,fishing,biking,swimming and climbing. When I go shooting I usually go by the railway track. Sometimes I get a shot at a rat and I usually miss. I use a 'B.S.A Mark 1 Airsporter' with open sights. When I go fishing I go down to Castlethorpe river with my 'Fishman' 9ft rod. I usually get a few Perch. I am hoping for a telescopic rod soon. When I go cycling I either go on my own track or I go up Long Street and have a few goes over the sort of corse there. When I go swimming I usually go to Stantonbury or Wolverton pool. When I go climbing I usually go up a tree and abseil down. I have not yet tackled a very steep rockface.
